name: Perspective Shift (Mimo)
description:
Idea

In this 3D game, you venture in attempt to solve the puzzle by reaching the green platform. Switch camera views from 3D to 2D to approach the puzzle from a different perspective.

Controls

W / up arrow : Move forward

A  / left arrow : Move Left

S  / down arrow : Move Down

D  / right arrow : Move Right

Space : Jump

R : Reset Camera

C : Change perspective 

+ : Zoom in (only in 2D)

- : Zoom out (only in 2D)

Background

This is my first game using unity so any feedback is appreciated. You'll quickly notice there are only four levels and they are relatively simple as they are meant to introduce the mechanics.

The game is inspired by a video I saw of a developer creating a similar game, however I can't remember the name of the game or the YouTube channel.
